title: 31 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No.
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 

(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 9 November 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 31) order 2020 (2) order come operation 9 november 2020

title: 31 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No.
heading: 2. The following bodies are, for the purposes of section 31 of the Civil Law
text_raw:
2. The following bodies are, for the purposes of section 31 of the Civil Law 
and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), 
designated and may hold hearings before it by remote hearing: 

An Bord Pleanála, established under section 3 of the Local Government 
(Planning and Development) Act 1976 (No. 20 of 1976); 

The National Oversight and Audit Commission, established under Part 12A of 
the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001), as inserted by section 61 of 
the Local Government Reform Act 2014 (No. 1 of 2014); 

The Property Registration Authority, established under section 9 of the 
Registration of Deeds and Title Act 2006 (No. 12 of 2006); 

The Pyrite Resolution Board, established under section 8 of the Pyrite Resolution 
Act 2013 (No. 51 of 2013); 

The Residential Tenancies Board, established under section 150 of the 
Residential Tenancies Act 2004 (No. 27 of 2004), as re-named under section 13 
of the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2015 (No. 42 of 2015); and 

The Valuation Tribunal, as continued in being under section 12 of the Valuation 
Act 2001 (No. 13 of 2001). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [518] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 November, 2020. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [518]
